item.title: R package documentation - what makes a good example?
item.description: As part of my ongoing mission to make the documentation of the arrow R package as good as it can be, Iâ€™ve started thinking about what makes for good examples. I have found that example code that I can run is the best way for me to achieve rapid familiarity with a new R function, and so believe that every exported function in a package should have an accompanying example.

item.title: R package documentation - what makes a good vignette?
